t: The Avatar: The Last Airbender Omnibus Boxed Set Has Dropped to a New Low Price on Amazon - IGN
s: April 18, 2025 - There have been five Avatar: The Last Airbender graphic novels released since the end of the animated series, and a new box set was just released that features all of them. Not only that, Amazon just recently dropped the price down to $83 in a historic new low.
